specifications.name: <identifier string, e.g. task_planning>
specifications.title: <title coming below opeEHR logo on front page, e.g. Task Planning (TP) Specification>
specifications.title_short: <title used in home page box for this spec, e.g. Task Planning (TP)>
specifications.description: <usually same as title but with 'openEHR' prepended; used for hover on web pages, tab titles in browswers etc, e.g. openEHR Task Planning specification>
specifications.summary: <used in right-hand column of component index page for this spec, e.g. An adaptive, executable, team-based model of workflow.>
specifications.spec_status: <spec status, i.e. DEVELOPMENT | TRIAL | STABLE | SUPERSEDED | OBSOLETE | ARCHIVED>
specifications.keywords: <keywords for this spec, should affect search engines>
